title: Tablecloth, 1939
medium: Technique: printed on plain weave foundation
inscribed: all along outer border, " Ask for Jimmie at Stork Club-Pierre at Twenty-One-Harry at Paradise-Gege at CoqRouge-Alphonse at International Casino-Leo at Casa Manana-Alfred at Versaille-Francois the Rainbow Room-Ambrose the Starlight Roof-Waldorf-Charles at Chatham-George at the Park Lane-Bernardi at the Hotel Pierre-Paul the Persian Room-and Harry at the Savoy-Plaza.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 128 x 134 cm (50 3/8 x 52 3/4 in.)
description: Central square with map of New York with nightclubs listed in bold type and with cartoon-like figures. Outer border a list of contacts.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tablecloth, 1939.
1939. Technique: printed on plain weave foundation. Gift of Paul Hollister. 1990-146-1.
